Secure - Sandbox Model
17/21

Protects users from hostile programs downloaded from untrusted sources across a network.

  • Customizable "sandbox" in which Java programs run.
    • Anything allowed within the boundaries of its sandbox
    • No actions allowed outside the sandbox
  • Fundamental sandbox components
    1. Safety features built in Java VM (and the language)
    2. The class loader architecture
    3. The class file verifier
    4. The security manager and Java API
What is Java ?
